meanings: (필요한 것을) look[search] for, obtain, (formal) seek, (찾아내다) find (out), (얻다) get
(조언·양해·용서 등을) ask (for), request, (formal) seek, turn to (=청하다)
(위험에서) rescue[save] (sb from sth), (곤경에서) (formal) extricate (sb from sth)

meanings.meaning: take[raise] a child out of the gutter

examples.korean: Teenager Matt Brown is being hailed a hero for saving a young child from drowning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 십대 소년인 매트 브라운은 물에 빠진 어린 아이를 구해 내어 영웅으로 일컬어지고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
